name: HappixT
description:
Hi Im Grilly and this is my Trijam #173 game

Well i suppose it fits in the theme because you are an ant and i think everybody hates them, Right?.  And your killing (HAPPY) people with something (i dont know what)

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys for movement

Mouse to KILL EVERYONE

Music by Eggy Toast in freemusicarchive.org (thanks)
